awd_titl_txt: Support Service for IRI Programs (Task Order # 26 for       Contract DGC 9216105)
awd_abstract_narration: This is a contract for various support services to be provided by               employees of National BioSystems, Inc. related to proposal                      handling, mailings to panelist and arrangements at panels meetings,             award and declination processing, and data entry before and after               the meetings of panels.  These activities are related to the                    NSF/DARPA initiative describe in NSF's Announcement No.  NSF-9319,              oriented towards "Research on Human Language Technology."  This is              not an annual program but the award is intended as a one-time                   support effort for the three-year NSF/DARPA initiative during a                 period when regular staff support is dedicated to the processing of             standard and continuing grants and other on-going duties.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
